document_data.name: ''Everard's morning star''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Everard's morning star''''' was a [[morning star|weapon]] that was once owned by the [[Everard|famous priest]] that lived in [[Easthaven]] during the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers:
''Everard's morning star'' possessed a ''+2 [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]''.

When it struck an [[arcane spellcaster]] there was a chance they would forget one of their previously memorized [[spell]]s.
document_data.History: Some time after Everard saved the [[Ten Towns]] in the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, his namesake morning star came into the possession of the merchant [[Joluv]].
